" + td.getDescription() + "\n");                fout.print(stringArray[i]);            } else {                System.out.println("Here is the list so far:");            }        } while ("y".equals(inputline));        return stringArray;    }}@Overridepublic String toString() {    return "ToDoList{" + "items=" + getItems()            + '}';}I am supposed to use the "getAddItem" method to allow the user to add to the list.
